resources.string: Only one chance to set gender and birthday
Only one chance to set birthday

In order to establish a civilized and friendly community environment, the following actions are prohibited: 

-Pornography 
-Violence 
-Bullying and hate speech 
-Any illegal behavior

If there is any violation, you can notify us by reporting the user, and the violator will be banned.

We value your privacy and personal information. Before you click to agree to the following agreement, please read it carefully and fully understand the terms of the agreement.
Your system message notification is off, whether go to settings?
In order to enjoy video chat,you need to grant all the permissions.
In order to video call and take photos, the camera permission needs to be turned on.
A more suitable person will be recommended based on your location, and the location permission needs to be turned on.
In order to video call, the microphone permission needs to be turned on.
In order to modify the avatar, send pictures to friends and etc, we need to access the photos from your album
Video call, take photos and store photos
Recommend more suitable people based on your location

Subscribe to VIP service for more fun!

After confirming the purchase, your iTunes account will be charged,and your subscription will automatically renew for the same package every month until you cancel in settings in iTunes store at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
Get special medals to show on your profile card to make you more attention
Send Likes without restrictions.After sending like,you can make him/her match you first.

Turn on notification to make sure you don’t miss any messages.
Give likes and you are more possible to match with him/her!
Send Message and make your friends here!
Check online and see who is active.
Gifting can bring a lot of fun for your chats.
Extend your happy moments by adding time.
Tips:Design your profile carefully can help to increase your charm;)
Take the chance to expand your social network!
Video calls can help to improve your social skills.
We all have a strong need for connectivity and belonging.
Positive social interactions increase our subjective well-being and provide greater life satisfaction
Conversations provide great opportunities to increase positive emotions.
A smile is the universal welcome!
Remember to be respectful and kind :-)
Share one of your fun facts with others
Knock knock,What have you been up to recently?
How to say Hello in your language?
Have you ever thought about moving to another country?
At snack time, does you prefer sweet or salty?
Are you a dog person or a cat person?
What’s the most memorable vacation you’ve ever taken?
Where did you take your profile photo;D?
Does your nickname has any special meaning?
So what is your favorite movie?
Try to make someone’s day today!
Try not to miss any chance to meet with a new friend!
Start your global exploration in Hilo!
Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.
Nothing lasts forever, but at least we’ve got these memories.
It is the encounters with people that make life worth living ;）
My heart is overflowing with joy to meet you.

Here you can meet new friends through 15-second random face-to-face video.Like it?Add more time!No interest?PASS! We pay great attention to the safety of the community. Any illegal, vulgar, violence, fraud and other bad behaviors will be blocked. Please be friendly, respectful and have fun in Hilo!
